Measures¶

Classes to measure cell variables throughout a simulation

class PyLongQt.Measures.GridMeasureManager¶

The measure manager for grid simulations

dataNodes¶

The nodes on which measurements will be made

class PyLongQt.Measures.Measure¶

Base class for measuring values during a simulation, one Measure is needed per cell variable

measure(self: PyLongQt.Measures.Measure, arg0: float, arg1: float) → bool¶

Measure values given the next time-point

nameString(self: PyLongQt.Measures.Measure, arg0: str) → str¶

The names the selected measured values

reset(self: PyLongQt.Measures.Measure) → None¶

Reset the measure and ready it for more time-points

selection¶

The selection of measured values to be written out

valueString(self: PyLongQt.Measures.Measure) → str¶

The current values of the of the selection

variables¶

The names of the measured values being tracked (eg min, peak)

variablesMap¶

pbdoc(The measured names and values being tracked (eg min, peak))pbdoc

class PyLongQt.Measures.MeasureDefault¶

Class that measures values for any cell variable that is not the transmembrane voltage (vOld)

class PyLongQt.Measures.MeasureFactory¶

Creates the appropriate Measure given a variable name

buildMeasure(self: PyLongQt.Measures.MeasureFactory, varname: str, selection: Set[str] = set()) → PyLongQt.Measures.Measure¶
Build the appropriate measure
varname:The cell variable name
selection:The selection of values to be measured
measureOptions(self: PyLongQt.Measures.MeasureFactory, measType: str) → Set[str]¶
Returns the values that can be measured by a measure class
measType:The name of the measure class
measureType(self: PyLongQt.Measures.MeasureFactory, varname: str) → str¶
Returns the name of the measure class for that variable name
varname:The cell variable’s name
percrepol¶

The percent repolarization at which an action potential ends

class PyLongQt.Measures.MeasureManager¶

Manages all the Measure objects for a simulation.

addMeasure(self: PyLongQt.Measures.MeasureManager, varname: str, selection: Set[str] = set()) → None¶
Add a new cell variable to be measured
varname:The cell variable’s name
selection:The variable’s values to be measured
measure(self: PyLongQt.Measures.MeasureManager, time: float, write: bool = False) → None¶
Measure all of the variables
time:The current simulation time (ms)
write:Should the measured values be saved
percrepol¶

The percent repolarization at which an action potential ends

selection¶

The selection of variables to measure and which values should be measured for each of those variables

setupMeasures(self: PyLongQt.Measures.MeasureManager) → None¶

Get measures ready for simulation

class PyLongQt.Measures.MeasureVoltage¶

Class that measures values for the transmembrane voltage (vOld)

percrepol¶

The percent repolarization at which an action potential ends
